Name: Core Passive: Metallic Paws
Additional Ability: Elegant Predator
Descriptions:
When Lycaon charges his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>40%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

When Lycaon charges his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>46.6%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

When Lycaon charges his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>53.3%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:

When Lycaon charges his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>66.6%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

When Lycaon charges his <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> to completion, the attack deals <color=#2BAD00>73.3%</color> increased Daze.
When <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Assist Follow-Up</color> hits an enemy, the target's <color=#98eff0>Ice DMG RES</color> decreases by 25% for 30s.

When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

Cons.Name: Full Moon Momentum
Cons.Effect: When Lycaon's <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.

Cons.Name: Energy Feedback
Cons.Effect: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color>, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.

Cons.Name: Graceful Demeanor
Cons.Effect:
If Lycaon is attacked while using a <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Special Attack</color>, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

Cons.Name: Ruthless Hunter
Cons.Effect: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
